answers.answer: You could be working on a UTI or other infection, related to the kidneys.  Sometimes in later pregnancy, protein in the urine could signal possible preeclampsia, but that shouldn't be an issue at 15 weeks.I'm sure the doctor's will follow you closely and make sure you don't have any bladder/kidney infections, etc.

Thanks but they didn't say sh** they said ill be fine and that there wasn't a uti or bladder infection but it does hurt when I go to the bathroom I've been drinking water like crazy no caffienated drinks no de-caffienated drinks just water and milk .

question: Hello ladies im really kind of shakin up went to the doctor Monday and the nurse said I have proteins in my urine dr. Told me not to worry about it but I still don't understand what that means I need some help thanks ladies have a blessed day
title: proteins in urine 15 weeks 1 day scared 1st baby
